title: So about Heartseeker Varus
body:
The question is, will OCE get the new skin before NA etc, considering that (at least in NZ) it's already Valentines day, or do we have to wait until the Yanks finally catch up to our time?

Swiggity Swarus, gimme Heartseeker Varus {{champion:110}}

replies.body: It came out 2 hours ago and you posted this 27 minutes ago... Really?

> [{quoted}](name=PRIMAWESOME,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=aH3vmNX4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-14T01:15:41.972+0000)
>
> It came out 2 hours ago and you posted this 27 minutes ago... Really?

I'd been refreshing the client (by exiting and re-logging in) every 20 mins and it hadn't shown up. It's only just shown up on my client in the last 10 min. :/ Dunno what happened there ...
